title: Is it true that the Google Pixel 5 and Pixel 4A 5G will not land in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Google pixel 5 will definitely launch if it’s a flagship ! and personally , I have doubt’s on google launching Pixel 4a in India! because , after all the taxes and import charges the device cost will rise significantly as you must be knowing what happens with the new apple devices which launch in India! so coming to my point , Oneplus Nord starts at 24,999INR and after all these importing charges and all I highly doubt pixel will be as cheap as Oneplus Nord ! And with google pixel 4a , google’s main motive was to provide better option than the Oneplus Nord , anyways this is what i think! I hope this answers you! thanks

Yes, it is true Google will not bring the pixel 4a 5G and pixel 5 in india. I think the reason in behind of the sales performance of the previous pixels. They are not so popular in India. So, Google will test the sale by launching the pixel 4a in India in October. If you found this information helpful please Upvote and join my tech space on Quora namedAndroid Bureau. Thanks.
